h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
h2_title: How to Find Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
content: After activating the first of the Keeper's Shrines, continue past it, following the path to the right. Head down to the slope, collecting the green Wisp on the left and into the center of the room. As you reach the middle, you'll be met by the first of the bosses in this secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top'.
The content is as follows:
After activating the first of the Keeper's Shrines, continue past it, following the path to the right. Head down to the slope, collecting the green Wisp on the left and into the center of the room. As you reach the middle, you'll be met by the first of the bosses in this secret area.
